title: Early Look At The NBA Market
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim Bontemps and Tim MacMahon discuss the moves that could be made at the trade deadline, an interesting quote from the Hawks front office, if the Blazers will move on from Dame or CJ and what teams will be buyers or sellers. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Moves Could Be Made At The Trade Deadline?
